name: Ext_R3_CommunicationRequest_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.CommunicationRequest.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents CommunicationRequest.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CommunicationRequest|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: draft | active | suspended | cancelled | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The status of the proposal or order.
element.comment: `CommunicationRequest.status` maps to R4 `CommunicationRequest.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This extension is a modifier because the target element CommunicationRequest.status is flagged IsModifier

element.short: draft | active | suspended | cancelled | completed | entered-in-error | unknown
element.definition: The status of the proposal or order.
element.comment: `CommunicationRequest.status` maps to R4 `CommunicationRequest.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: The status of the communication request.
